  • weekly picks (May 4 week 2022)
  • A WordCloud of 2022 May 4th week collection

    1. https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.11462v1 Mott insulator state in a van der Waals flat-band compound (flatband, arxiv.org)

    2. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10903 Odd frequency pairing in a quantum critical metal (chubukov, arXiv.org)

    3. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.11383 Two-dimensional Kondo lattice in a TaS2 van der Waals heterostructure (TaS2, arXiv.org)

    4. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.11272 Mean-field Study of Antiferromagnetic and Antiferroquadrupolar Orderings in Tetragonal CeCoSi (Hayami, arXiv.org)

    5. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10876 Disorder-driven dissipative quantum criticality as a source of strange metal behavior (Disorder quatnum critical, arXiv.org)

    6. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10795 Observation of classical to quantum crossover in electron glass (arXiv.org)

    7. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevX.12.021043 Low-Temperature Competing Magnetic Energy Scales in the Topological Ferrimagnet ${\mathrm{TbMn}}{6}{\mathrm{Sn}}{6}$ (kagome, PRX)

    8. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.210401 Observation of Massless and Massive Collective Excitations with Faraday Patterns in a Two-Component Superfluid (PRL)

    9. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.210502 Quantifying Qubit Magic with Gottesman-Kitaev-Preskill Encoding (Bose quantum, PRL)

    10. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.217402 Chiral Excitonics in Monolayer Semiconductors on Patterned Dielectrics (chiral exciton, PRL)

    11. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.217701 Observation of Reentrant Correlated Insulators and Interaction-Driven Fermi-Surface Reconstructions at One Magnetic Flux Quantum per Moir\‘e Unit Cell in Magic-Angle Twisted Bilayer Graphene (PRL)

    12. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.128.217201 Tunable Magnonic Chern Bands and Chiral Spin Currents in Magnetic Multilayers (PRL)

    13. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195134 Critical role of magnetic moments in heavy-fermion materials: Revisiting ${\mathrm{SmB}}_{6}$ (PRB)

    14. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.205427 Two-dimensional magnetoelectric multiferroics in a $\mathrm{MnSTe}/{\mathrm{In}}{2}{\mathrm{Se}}{3}$ heterobilayer with ferroelectrically controllable skyrmions (skyrmion, PRB)

    15. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.L180303 Chiral anomaly in noncentrosymmetric systems induced by spin-orbit coupling (HWLee, PRB)

    16. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.174425 Annihilation dynamics of magnetic skyrmion lattice state under in-plane magnetic field and spontaneous recovery after field removal (PRB)

    17. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195135 Pressure-induced electronic transitions in samarium monochalcogenides (PRB)

    18. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.205131 Superconductivity and antiferromagnetism in ${\mathrm{NdNiO}}{2}$ and ${\mathrm{CaCuO}}{2}$: A cluster DMFT study (AJMillis, PRB)

    19. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195133 Angular momentum invoked band inversions in mirror symmetry protected topological states (PRB)

    20. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195427 Direct $d\text{\ensuremath{-}}d$ hybridization mechanism for strong anisotropic carrier transport in layered ${\mathrm{Mo}}{2}{\mathrm{SBr}}{2}$ (PRB)

    21. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195428 Spin-orbit coupling in transition metal dichalcogenide heterobilayer flat bands (flatband, PRB)

    22. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.205128 Giant spectral renormalization and complex hybridization physics in the Kondo lattice system ${\mathrm{CeCuSb}}_{2}$ (PRB)

    23. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.195426 Orbital magnetization of Floquet topological systems (orbital floquet, PRB)

    24. https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevB.105.205126 Semiclassical magnetotransport including effects of Berry curvature and Lorentz force (PRB)

    25. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10352 Impact of Retardation in the Holstein-Hubbard Model: a two-site Calculation (Holstein model, arXiv.org)

    26. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10346 Determination of the charge transfer when tunneling into putative Majorana modes in individual vortices in FeTe${0.55}$Se${0.45}$ (majorana, arXiv.org)

    27. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10062 Effect of substrate spin-orbit coupling on the topological gap size of Shiba chains (arXiv.org)

    28. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10069 Topological superconductivity and Majorana states in low-dimensional systems (majorana, arXiv.org)

    29. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.10039 Resistivity and Thermal Conductivity of an Organic Insulator beta’-EtMe3Sb[Pd(dmit)2]2 (YMatsuda, arXiv.org)

    30. http://arxiv.org/abs/2205.09866 Topological properties of Dirac and Weyl semimetals (Burkov, arXiv.org)
